content: How can I stop the VSCode Lean Infoview from hiding information behind the ellipsis (â‹¯) character? (I don't have a specific example in mind because I run into this constantly.)
You are probably looking for set_option pp.deepTerms true
Note you can also click on the ellipsis to see the hidden information.

If you hover over the ellipsis, it should explain what option was the one responsible for the omission.

It might be that you have pp.proofs false set:

image.png

Or it might be that you have pp.deepTerms false set:

image.png

(It's most likely the first case since pp.deepTerms is true by default.)
set_option pp.proofs true solved my issue, thank you!
Niklas Halonen has marked this topic as resolved.
